TEXT.S: = Sarad = Gaga mniq Hwareyseyn Ciansyang ka alang Sarad. 3,309 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 8,721 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 7% niqan 608 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 93% niqan 8,113 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Amis 5%, Truku 1%, Bunun 0.5%.
